summary: Three women who secretly gave their new-born sons up for adoption in 1945, wonder if the 5-year old survivor of a plane crash, named in the local newspapers, is their long-abandoned son.
cast: Eleanor Parker|Patricia Neal|Ruth Roman|Frank Lovejoy|Leif Erickson|Ted de Corsia|Edmon Ryan|Larry Keating|Katherine Warren|Arthur Franz|Jay Adler|Joel Allen|Eleanor Audley|Margaret Bert|Billy Bevan|Walden Boyle|Peter Brocco|Ralph Brooks|Nana Bryant|John Butler|Wheaton Chambers|Russ Conway|Cathy Dart|John Dehner|Glen Denning|Lester Dorr|Christian Drake|Ross Elliott|Frank Fenton|Edmund Glover|Tim Graham|Eula Guy|Mary Alan Hokanson|Edna Holland|Ray Hyke|Perc Launders|George Lynn|Mike Mahoney|Rory Mallinson|Lou Marcelle|David McMahon|Ralph Montgomery|John Morgan|Paul Picerni|Gilman Rankin|Duncan Richardson|William Self|Charles Sherlock|William Tannen|Kenneth Tobey|Charles Wagenheim|Janet Warren|Willard Waterman|Bill Welsh|Frank Wilcox|Frances E. Williams|Mack Williams|Mervin Williams
title: Tres secretos
